document_data.name: Arcane abjuration
document_data.mainbody: '''''Arcane abjuration''''' was a ''[[channel divinity]]'' power granted to [[cleric]]s of the [[Arcana domain]].
document_data.Effects:
By presenting their [[holy symbol]] at a single [[celestial]], [[elemental]], [[fey]], or [[fiend]], the cleric could compel it to turn and flee for up to one minute.

More powerful clerics using this power on a creature that was not on its native plane could ''[[Banishment|banish]]'' it for one minute. The stronger the cleric became, the stronger the creatures that were susceptible to being banished by this power.
document_data.Components: Only the cleric's holy symbol was required to evoke this power.
